title: Small Farm Irrigation - Video 5 - Attaching and Plugging Drip Tape to a Lay Flat Header Pipe

tasks.task: Attaching drip tape to a header pipe and plugging the end
subtasks: Gather necessary tools (Phillips head screwdriver, fittings)
Twist fitting onto header pipe and tighten
Punch hole in lay flat header using screwdriver
Confirm water flow when hole is punched
Push fitting into hole, ensuring a secure click/pop
Plug drip tape end by cutting 1-2 inches, folding, and inserting
Ensure water is off before plugging end
Turn water on to check for leaks and kinks
Secure drip tape with soil to prevent displacement
Apply water directly to plants without wetting them

tasks.task: Plugging the end of the drip tape
subtasks: Cut 1-2 inches from end of drip tape
Fold the cut end in half and double over
Insert folded end into the main body of the tape
